original_text: And the pillars of bronze that were in the house of the Lord, and the stands and the bronze sea that were in the house of the Lord, the Chaldeans broke in pieces and carried the bronze to Babylon.
korean_text: 갈대아 사람이 또 여호와의 성전의 두 놋 기둥과 받침들과 여호와의 성전의 놋 바다를 깨뜨려 그 놋을 바벨론으로 가져가고

sentences.original_text: that were in the house of the Lord,
and the stands and the bronze sea
that were in the house of the Lord,
and carried the bronze to Babylon.
